hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated from Jarir on the authority of A'mash with the same chain of transmitters and he said (these words with a little bit of variation from the previous hadith):When (fasting) in Ramadan was (made) obligatory, he abandoned it (the practice of observing fast on Ashura)

chapter.eng-name: Fasting on the day of Ashura'
